description.title: DataOps
texts: DataOps, short for Data Operations, is an agile, process-oriented methodology used for designing, implementing, and managing data workflows and a distributed data architecture. It aims to improve the communication, integration, and automation of data flows between data managers and consumers across an organization.

DataOps draws inspiration from DevOps, applying its principles to the data pipeline, ensuring data quality, reducing cycle times, and fostering collaboration between teams to deliver reliable data faster.
